did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Noticia a la Visita General de Padre Ignacio Lizasoain... 1761-1763
did.abstract: Holograph inventory of the missions throughout the provinces of California, Sonora, Tarahumara, Chinipas and Nayarit. Lizasoaín was appointed Jesuit Visitador General in 1761.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Lizasoaín was appointed Jesuit Visitador General in 1761.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph inventory of the missions throughout the provinces of California, Sonora, Tarahumara, Chinipas and Nayarit.

relatedmaterial.p: English translation may be found at: MS 222.
Photocopy. Original in Austin, Tx : University of Texas Latin American Collection, W. B. Stephens Collection.
